includedAssets.title: AVP: Alien vs. Predator
includedAssets.synopsis: It's the sci-fi smackdown of the century as the most formidable hunters in the universe take on the galaxy's nastiest xenomorphs in a ferocious battle for supremacy - and we're caught in the middle. After discovering a mysterious pyramid in the Antarctic, a dying billionaire (Lance Henriksen) and his crack team realise - rather belatedly - that it's an ancient training ground for extraterrestrial warriors. What's more, the Predators are using acid-dripping Aliens for prey. But now there's fresh sport for both species...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The formidable foes go jaw to claw in a ferocious Antarctic showdown. Killer sci-fi from Paul WS Anderson.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: It's the sci-fi smackdown of the century as the most formidable hunters in the universe take on the galaxy's nastiest xenomorphs in a ferocious battle for supremacy - and we're caught in the middle. After discovering a mysterious pyramid in the Antarctic, a dying billionaire (Lance Henriksen) and his crack team realise - rather belatedly - that it's an ancient training ground for extraterrestrial warriors. What's more, the Predators are using acid-dripping Aliens for prey. But now there's fresh sport for both species...

includedAssets.title: Aliens vs. Predator: Requiem
includedAssets.synopsis: A rogue alien spaceship crashlands in the woods above a humdrum American town. Not for long. Hot on its trail is a new adversary - a Predalien - whose job it is to mop up the acid-dripping extra-terrestrials. Bodies are eviscerated and craniums explode as the sworn intergalactic rivals go head-to-head. AVP gore hounds will find much on which to feast in this sci-fi bloodbath from special effects supremos The Brothers Strause. It sure ain't no waltz.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The residents of a small town find themselves caught up in a bloody battle between the deadly intergalactic beasties in this gory monster mash.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A rogue alien spaceship crashlands in the woods above a humdrum American town. Not for long. AVP gore hounds will find much on which to feast in this sci-fi bloodbath from special effects supremos The Brothers Strause. It sure ain't no waltz.

includedAssets.title: AVP Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Two of cinema's deadliest foes clash in this double-bill of otherworldly carnage. A group of explorers inadvertently discover an ancient training ground for Predators, before a small town is caught in the middle of an extra-terrestrial bloodbath.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cinema's deadliest foes clash in this double-bill of otherworldly carnage. A team of explorers and a small town are caught up in the bloodbath.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Two of cinema's deadliest foes clash in this double-bill of otherworldly carnage. A group of explorers inadvertently discover an ancient training ground for Predators, before a small town is caught in the middle of an extra-terrestrial bloodbath.

includedIn.title: AVP
includedIn.synopsis: An Antarctic exploration team inadvertently uncover a training ground where the universe's deadliest predators hunt vicious aliens, finding themselves caught in the middle of a deadly battle. Later, residents of a small town find their home the arena for a bloody rematch.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A team of explorers find themselves caught in the middle of a deadly alien battle. Later, a small town becomes the scene of a bloody rematch.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: An Antarctic exploration team inadvertently uncover a training ground where the universe's deadliest predators hunt vicious aliens, finding themselves caught in the middle of a deadly battle. Later, residents of a small town find their home the arena for a bloody rematch.
